comment: You'll defo need the textbook and her lectures to pass. She's really heavy on attendance, so she'll offer material only in class sometimes. If you skip class that day, you're just gonna have to ask a friend for notes. Despite that though, her lectures are amazing and never boring. She's an amazing professor with an amazing outlook.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor Harrison made the class pretty easy. My class was hybrid, so the only reason to really go to class was to get attendance points and sometimes we had activities in class. Other than that, most of the work was online on Launchpad.

Professor Harrison is a great teacher, I enjoyed going to her class and she made classes fun. There were 5 quizzes, 5 group projects, a midterm and final plus a sleep journal. The quizzes are easy as long as you study the material and the tests are easy if you do well on the quizzes. She does not accept any late work so do not except leniency.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Professor Harrison is easily one of the best Psych professors at KSU. She has so many real life stories from her encounters with patients and her old jobs. Her classes are super interesting and she makes sure to make things fun. You have to put work in to do well in her class, but if you do, you will be rewarded with learning all kinds of new info.

She basically rewords what the power points say, however there are blanks which you can only fill in by coming to class. Her grading criteria are not clear. We had a group paper due each week and there was always something different wrong, so it seemed like she just wanted to count points off. The rubric was very poor in describing expectations.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Tests? Not many

comment: Professor Harrison is great. There's a midterm and a final, a short assignment for each chapter, and a sleep study assignment. The tests are not overly difficult but there is a lot of information to remember for each one. Her lectures and the material are very interesting though. As long as you come, take notes, and study you'll be fine.

SHE IS AWESOME. Take her. She is very knowledgeable and truly cares about what she is teaching and who she is teaching. Participate in her lectures, and the information will come easy. She is very clear with what she expects, and you will pass if you prepare. 6-7 quizzes, midterm, final, discussion posts, and participation consist of your grade.

Dr. Harrison is a great professor. She is very straightforward and approachable. She is not shy about discussing the topics in this class. Very informative and open discussion. Her quizzes can be used as study guides for her exams. Attendance is not mandatory, but she will give extra points if you miss less than two classes. Highly recommend her!

Material was trashy and lots of students bragging about the nasty details of their hookups, cringe. There were no pop quizzes, idk what the other person meant. Quizzes worded weird thus difficult. Tests are easy if you study quizzes. Paper easy. 5 points for no absences, but it's a waste ur time, trust me don't do it. Shes just OK. I hated class.

Professor Harrison was fine. If you don't really enjoy talking about every detail of sex, do not take this class. Lecture slides are repetitive and hard to follow, and quizzes are hard if you don't read thoroughly. Some of the questions are worded really strange and are hard to understand. I did not enjoy this class at all.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Harrison is so great I am taking her again next semester! She keeps things interesting although you have to take a ton of notes. She is very approachable and cares about what she is teaching.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Do NOT takethis professor.  The reading is incredible and her tests are impossible.  Take a different professor for human sexuality.  She gives pop quizzes so if you don't read every night and skipa day, you will get a 0 on the quiz.  I ruined my gpa.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: TAKE HER. The class is very open and comfortable, she is so cool and wants to hear other peoples opinions and stories. I would take her again in a heartbeat. Gives you all the tools you need to get a 100 on the midterm and final. One paper, but you choose the topic so it's a breeze. She is amazing. Fun easy class. Seriously, take her.

Professor Harrison was a really good teacher! She grades you on a midterm and a final, about 6-7 quizzes, and 4 papers. All super easy, just make sure you know the material. Gives extra credit points if you miss less than 2 classes, so going is very important! Definitely would take again!

I liked Professor Harrison until about the end of the semester. You aren't allowed to turn stuff in later and due to unforeseen circumstances I was unable to turn a paper in and she didn't get back in contact with me when I emailed her and I missed an A by 7 points because of it. Easy class, just don't expect any leniency.

Lectures are mostly off Powerpoints, but she does add some information that is not on the slides and not in the book, so it's important to attend class. Exams are directly from quizzes. But, quizzes can be poorly worded and sometimes confusing.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Loved this class! Would definitely recommend if you're taking human sexuality. She's very open and friendly and she makes the class interesting. Wouldn't recommend if you're not open to discussing sex and the topics that surround it because the class will make you feel uncomfortable. But easy A if you show up to class and do what your supposed to.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--Caring

comment: She grades tough and gives pop quizzes every class.  Attendance is a grade and if you miss more than 2, your gradde drops.  I would  not recommend this professor at all.  She grades harshly.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Professor Harrison is AWESOME. If you can take her, do it. Lots of discussion, attendance matters, there is a writing assignment. The quizzes are straightforward and the midterm/final follow suit. The material covered is genuinely interesting and you will learn A LOT. If you take her be sure to ask her about potatoes.

Professor Harrison is AMAZING. Super laid back and doesn't keep an uptight demeanor in her class. She emphasizes reading the book, but if you take her for HUMAN SEXUALITY like i did, you'll want to read it! Her class was my favorite out of all my courses. LOVED HER!
Lover Her class!!! If you take human sexuality please take her!!!! Her class is really fun and interesting and there's a lot of discussion. She's not afraid to talk about anything!!! Take HER!!!

She was fantastic, one of the best psychology teachers I have taken! Trying to take more classes with her in the future!! Take her! She gives great outside examples, is easy going and very nice. Doesn't respond to emails quickly and moves really fast on her Powerpoints so print them out ahead of class.  Her tests are the exact same quiz questions
Hybrid course. Weekly online discussion post. Attendance is mandatory. 2 test (midterm and final 100 questions each) & 1 paper. Gives extra credit. She's a decent teacher. Would take her again.

She contradicts herself often which makes testquizzes confusing. She does take role so attendance is important. If you are the type of person to take notes on an electronic device that is not allowed. Her grading scale is inaccurate and will state she mentioned it in class so make sure you are on time. Take notes those are the testquiz questions.

Honestly, Professor Harrison rocks. She doesn't make you sit through long boring lectures. She allows you to think for yourself by changing your perspective on the issues. Print her power points and study those for the midterm and final and you will get an A in the class. Too bad this is only worth 2 credit hours, I would have loved to stay

Show up to class every day, skim the issue (chapter) for that day, be there for the review session the class before the test, and review the power points. The information is cool and class usually ended up being a debate. Oh there is a paper and presentation. Just write it how to book is written and present confidently and you'll get an easy A

As long as you show up to class you should be fine. There's two tests, a paper, and two in class assignments. I didn't buy the book and I got an A. The subject matter is easy and pretty interesting. She takes attendance though and there are in class assignments so you need to go most days.
Class is pretty boring, but testsquizzes are simple enough if you study the vocab. Even though it is the 21st century, she won't allow students to use computers, so bring a notebook and pen.
Very boring teacher and won't let you use your computer in class. Make notecards for the bolded words, and you will get an A. Attendance is required. Tells a lot of personal stories.
This is an easy A class if you just read the chapters and make flashcards. Just didn't appreciate her attitude.
Quizes are a little difficult but if you want an A and talk to her about it, show up for every class and she can see you're trying, you're going to get an A
Professor Harrison is awesome! She really knows her stuff. Her lectures are fun, and her tests are easy. Take her!
Easy two hour class! Take her. Just do all the work and when there is a test, simple. Offered an extra credit assignment of watching a movie in theaters! Very interesting material you learn :)

Professor Harrison is great!  She has good discussions on the content of her class and is very helpful if you ask.  She also responds quickly to emails.  The only thing I could complain about is that it took her a long time to enter the final grades and is sometimes a little disorganized.

FANTASTIC TEACHER! She is more  than willing to help and she is very clear on what she expects.She tells you when the pop quizzes are and reviews the midterm and final, if I could take her class again, I would! She is very personable! By far my favorite professor so far!
